title: 'Too much heat'
body: 'Product is good but too much heat'

title: 'Value for money and quality is good.'
body: 'Value for money and quality is good. 4pillows for 1400 change is good deal but the only issue is with the height is low so people who want higher pillow need to use 2of them at a time.'

title: 'Worth it!'
body: 'Bought 4 pillows for my home. Quality is really good and so is the comfort. Comes with designed cover. While white pillows get stained very easily due to sweat and usage these coloured pillows are better to look. Go for it.'

title: 'Good pillow considering the quality'
body: 'Pillow is quite comfortable considering the price the offered with competitors.  Good buy even good for kids aged 8 years as it is quite soft.'

title: 'order 4pillow but recd only 3 pillow they cheated'
'Amazon Brand - Solimo Microfibre & Polyester 4-Piece Premium Bed Pillow Set'
